48.movie_plot: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

342.movie_plot: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

237.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

114.movie_plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

324.movie_plot: Three stories are connected by a Memphis hotel and the spirit of Elvis Presley.

197.movie_name: All Quiet on the Western Front (1930)
197.movie_plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

149.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

154.movie_plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

61.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

145.movie_plot: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

228.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

72.movie_plot: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

56.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

132.movie_plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

6.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

138.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

43.movie_plot: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

45.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
45.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

78.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

96.movie_name: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
96.movie_plot: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start swearing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

297.movie_plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

35.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

10.movie_plot: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

293.movie_plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group The Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

177.movie_plot: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

334.movie_plot: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

110.movie_plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

77.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
77.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

294.movie_plot: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

88.movie_plot: An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides.

298.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

175.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

176.movie_plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

101.movie_plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist, while both sides attempt to find balance between their personal and their professional lives.

225.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

326.movie_plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

29.movie_plot: An all-out war looms when the discovery of a cure for mutations draws a line between the followers of Charles Xavier and those of Magneto.

25.movie_plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

287.movie_plot: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

87.movie_plot: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

227.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

100.movie_plot: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

210.movie_plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

120.movie_plot: Film about filmmaking. It takes place during one day on set of non-budget movie. Ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers.

290.movie_plot: The story of the final Emperor of China.

328.movie_plot: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

113.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

130.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

37.movie_plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

98.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

189.movie_plot: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

156.movie_plot: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

184.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

233.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

30.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

51.movie_plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

15.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

95.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

60.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

108.movie_plot: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

54.movie_plot: Ambitious but troubled movie director, Edward D. Wood Jr, tries his best to fulfill his dream, despite his lack of support.

159.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

32.movie_plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

188.movie_plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

244.movie_plot: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

89.movie_plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

362.movie_plot: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

253.movie_plot: A wealthy New York investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

311.movie_plot: Two high school nerds attempt to create the perfect woman, but she turns out to be more than that.

71.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
71.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

240.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

356.movie_plot: An undercover FBI agent falls in love with a recently widowed mafia wife, who is trying to restart her life following her husband's murder while being pursued by a libidinous mafia kingpin seeking to claim her for himself.

337.movie_plot: After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, kills Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.
